metadata.description: United States wins Milano Cortina 2026 Men's Ice Hockey gold

outcome_space.description: Who will win the Milano Cortina 2026 Men's Ice Hockey gold medal?
outcome_space.outcome_statement: {outcome} wins the Milano Cortina 2026 Men's Ice Hockey gold medal

base_case.fsp_resolution: FSP=1 if {outcome} is officially awarded the Men's Ice Hockey gold medal at the Milano Cortina 2026 Olympic Winter Games (evaluates to TRUE). FSP=0 if {outcome} is not officially awarded gold (evaluates to FALSE). FSP=0.5 if no gold medal winner is officially awarded (evaluates to UNRESOLVED). Primary source: Olympics.com Milano Cortina 2026 schedule/results page <https://www.olympics.com/en/milano-cortina-2026/schedule> (filter sport: Ice Hockey; event: Men's). Secondary source: IIHF schedule/results <https://www.iihf.com/en/events/2026/olympic-m/schedule>.

edge_cases.condition: The event is cancelled/abandoned and no gold medal winner is officially awarded, and {outcome} has not been officially eliminated/forfeited.
edge_cases.fsp_resolution: FSP=0.5 (evaluates to UNRESOLVED). Primary: <https://www.olympics.com/en/milano-cortina-2026/schedule> (filter sport: Ice Hockey; event: Men's). Secondary: <https://www.iihf.com/en/events/2026/olympic-m/schedule>.

edge_cases.condition: {outcome} is officially eliminated/withdraws/forfeits before being awarded gold.
edge_cases.fsp_resolution: FSP=0 (evaluates to FALSE). Primary: <https://www.olympics.com/en/milano-cortina-2026/schedule> (filter sport: Ice Hockey; event: Men's). Secondary: <https://www.iihf.com/en/events/2026/olympic-m/schedule>.

oracle_config.description: Manual oracle system for product settlement
